longBusinessSummary: Miramar Hotel and Investment Company, Limited, an investment holding company, engages in travel, property rental, hotels and serviced apartments, and food and beverage businesses in the People's Republic of China and Hong Kong. It leases office and retail premises; and operates hotels and serviced apartments, as well as provides hotel management services. The company also operates restaurants; offers travel agency, and property management services; and sells properties. Miramar Hotel and Investment Company, Limited was founded in 1948 and is based in Tsim Sha Tsui, Hong Kong.
